value:
$WmMPID_外伝パオラ,ch10_28_Paora_F_Normal,Face|I'm Palla. I've come from Archanea
in search of my sister.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE14_06,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Good work, $Nu!$k$pAnd well done, everyone else too.
Get some rest. You earned it!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|After all that, I'm sooo hungry...$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|Commander Anna, I have a proposal.$k$pWould you allow me to prepare
dinner this evening?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Huh? ...You, Princess Nótt?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Yes! I know I caused you all so much
trouble before...$k$pAnd since we were caught up in the
middle of a chase, things were never
exactly resolved, so...$k$pI am asking for a chance to offer
a proper food-based apology to
everyone here.$k$pEspecially $Nu...$k$pI handed you over to Ótr, after all!
Surely you're angry about that...$k$p$EFace_Smile|To have forgiven me so easily...
You are a truly kind person.$k$pEven so, I am quite embarrassed
to have been manipulated so easily.$k$p$EFace_Cool|I've had a change of heart, and I want
to do what I can to make things right
with you, $Nu...$k$pIf you can somehow find it in your—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Err... Princess Nótt?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Your face... Now that I've had a good
look at it, I cannot help but notice,
$Nu, that you're—$k$p$EFace_Pain|No! I mustn't! I just swore I'd change
my ways!$k$pAnd yet...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Umm... Princess Nótt? There was
mention of food, and I'm really
quite hungry...$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Y-yes! Of course! Please, leave it all
to me, and you won't regret it!$k$p$EFace_Smile|I will put my whole heart into this
meal and make it a delicious treat
for all to partake of!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|All right! I can't wait!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|...Yes! Seems like I was able to sneak
out of the castle without anyone
noticing me slip away.$k$pThanks to Princess Nótt's cooking,
everyone fell fast asleep once their
bellies were full.$k$p$EFace_Pain|I'm so sorry, everyone... It's my fault
you're all exhausted and in pain.$k$pThe least I can do is go find the cause
of my brother's behavior—and do it
alone if I have to.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Fáfnir, Brother... I know you are
suffering right now, but...I will find
a way to help you! Just hold on!$k$p$Sbs150|
